description: Strand units: Spatial awareness, 2-D shapes, 3-D shapes, Symmetry and Angles

teaching.topicContent: Introduction to triangular prisms as 3-D shapes with triangular bases and rectangular sides. Discuss the properties of triangular prisms, such as faces, edges, and vertices. Explore the relationship between triangular prisms and their constituent 2-D shapes.

Introduction to pyramids as 3-D shapes with polygonal base and triangular sides meeting at a vertex. Discuss the different types of pyramids, such as square pyramids and triangular pyramids. Explore the symmetry, properties, and practical applications of pyramids.
Exploring Various Types and Definitions of Angles.
